pattern.message: Please enter a valid host (examples: localhost example.com some.example.com)
Please enter a valid domain (examples: http://www.example.com example.com localhost:8080)

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "#{id}"?

field.name: description
field.value: If set to true, the name of the currently selected tab is being appended to the URL as a get-parameter. Addresses the issue that IE loses the anchor on a redirect.

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.appendTabId"?

field.name: description
field.value: A semicolon-separated list of folder-names (relative to 'wwwDir') containing static resources such as images or pdfs

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.assetsDir"?

field.name: description
field.value: The name of the application which is responsible for the authentication

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.authApplication"?

field.name: description
field.value: The names of the login-pages (comma-separated) within the application defined in 'authApplication'. The number of comma-separated pages must be the same as in 'authLoginRef', because 'authLoginRef[n]' refers to 'authLoginPage[n]'!

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.authLoginPage"?

field.name: description
field.value: The action names (comma-separated) for the pages defined in {@link #AUTH_LOGIN_PAGE}. The number of comma-separated names must be the same as in 'authLoginPage', because 'authLoginRef[n]' refers to 'authLoginPage[n]'!

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.authLoginRef"?

field.name: description
field.value: The name for the parameter defining the action on the logout-page

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.authLogoutActionName"?

field.name: description
field.value: The value for the parameter defining the action on the logout-page

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.authLogoutActionValue"?

field.name: description
field.value: The name of the logout-page within the application defined in 'authApplication'

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.authLogoutPage"?

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.authLogoutRef"?

field.name: description
field.value: The fully qualified name of a class implementing org.appng.core.repository.config.DatasourceConfigurer, which is responsible for JDBC connection-pooling. Supported are 'org.appng.core.repository.config.BoneCPConfigurer', 'org.appng.core.repository.config.HikariCPConfigurer' and 'org.appng.core.repository.config.TomcatJdbcConfigurer'

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.DatasourceConfigurer"?

field.name: description
field.value: The application to be called after a successful login

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.defaultApplication"?

field.name: description
field.value: The name of the default-page (without extension) relative to one of the directories defined in 'documentDir'

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.defaultPage"?

field.name: description
field.value: The default page size (items per page)

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.defaultPageSize"?

field.name: description
field.value: A semicolon-separated list of folder-names (relative to 'wwwDir') containing JSP-files and static resources

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.documentDir"?

field.name: description
field.value: The time, in milliseconds, to wait for the filter before a LockTimeoutException is thrown

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.ehcacheBlockingTimeout"?

field.name: description
field.value: Whether or not the Ehcache is cleared on a site shutdown/reload

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.ehcacheClearOnShutdown"?

field.name: description
field.value: Set to true to enable Ehcache for this site

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.ehcacheEnabled"?

field.name: description
field.value: URL path prefixes which are never cached. Contains one prefix per line (CLOB value).

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.ehcacheExceptions"?

field.name: description
field.value: Set to true to enable Ehcache statistics

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.ehcacheStatistics"?

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.encoding"?

field.name: description
field.value: Set to true to enforce the protocol used by the site (http or https)

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.enforcePrimaryDomain"?

field.name: description
field.value: The name of the default error-page (without extension) relative to 'wwwDir'

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.errorPage"?

field.name: description
field.value: The name of the error-page per document-directory (see 'documentDir'), multiple entries separated by a pipe (|)

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.errorPages"?

field.name: description
field.value: The host of the site. For convenience only, do not change!

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.host"?

field.name: description
field.value: For each directory defined in 'documentDir', there can be defined which locale and which Lucene-analyzer to use for indexing.

link.label: Delete
link.confirmation: Do you really want to delete the property "platform.site.appng.indexConfig"?

link.label: Reset
link.confirmation: Do you really want to reset the database connection "#{name}"?

field.name: value
field.value: Ehcache is disabled for this site. To enable the cache set the site property 'platform.site.appng.ehcacheEnabled' to 'true'.

field.name: userAgent
field.value: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:38.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/38.0
